name: Dream of Souls
description:
This is a game that was built for a game jam so expect funny bugs 🐞, crazy puzzles 🧩️, ambiguous story 📕and a lot of spelling mistakes 🤓.

Play with a boy and a girl helping each other to solve different puzzles to reach the end of their story, don't worry nobody dies at the end 😉.

This game was developed by the strong mind and swifty hands of Mohamed Al labban (Meegow).

Hope you enjoy it 🤗 and if you didn't please don't hate us 😢.
